# Runbook name

## Purpose
When to use this runbook

## Prerequisites
Access, permissions, resources

## Quick checks
- [ ] Service up?
- [ ] Errors in logs?

## Procedure
1. Step 1
2. Step 2

## Rollback
How to revert safely

## Verification
What to check to validate the resolution
